###### Data Visualization Specialties * Building charts and tables you can actually understand. * Creating data visualizations you are excited to share. * Delivering situational awareness through Tableau/PowerBI dashboards. * Accelerating important business conversations by leveraging data more powerfully. * Scaling data visualization and reporting programmatically using R, Python, & SQL. * Organizing data and reporting using Microsoft Excel.
